cdx6500GCTSVCBroadcastTable.name: cdx6500GCTSVCBroadcastTable
cdx6500GCTSVCBroadcastTable.description: A list of Broadcast SBCO configuration entries.

cdx6500bcstSBCOcfgEntry.name: cdx6500bcstSBCOcfgEntry
cdx6500bcstSBCOcfgEntry.description: The entries for the Broadcast SBCO table.

cdx6500bcstSBCOnum.name: cdx6500bcstSBCOnum
cdx6500bcstSBCOnum.description: Index for the Broadcast SBCO configuration table.

cdx6500bcstSBCOnet.name: cdx6500bcstSBCOnet
cdx6500bcstSBCOnet.description: The main channel subaddress of the Broadcast, BCST.

cdx6500bcstSBCOcalledAddr.name: cdx6500bcstSBCOcalledAddr
cdx6500bcstSBCOcalledAddr.description: Call packets containing this called address will enable broadcast traffic for this net.

cdx6500bcstSBCOcallingAddr.name: cdx6500bcstSBCOcallingAddr
cdx6500bcstSBCOcallingAddr.description: Call packets containing this calling address will enable broadcast traffic for this net.

cdx6500bcstSBCOfacilities.name: cdx6500bcstSBCOfacilities
cdx6500bcstSBCOfacilities.description: Call packets containing the facility bytes shown will enable broadcast traffic for this net.

cdx6500bcstSBCOuserData.name: cdx6500bcstSBCOuserData
cdx6500bcstSBCOuserData.description: Call packets containing the user data bytes shown will enable broadcast traffic for this net.

cdx6500bcstSBCOdirection.name: cdx6500bcstSBCOdirection
cdx6500bcstSBCOdirection.description: This specifies the direction in which broadcast traffic will be sent. Select options on this broadcast net as follows: none - no option specified called - send traffic towards the called address calling - send traffic towards the calling address Any combination of above specified by summing (e.g. called + calling).

cdx6500bcstSBCOdestination.name: cdx6500bcstSBCOdestination
cdx6500bcstSBCOdestination.description: This specifies who the destination is and what will happen to the broadcast message. Select options on this broadcast net as follows: user - end user to receive broadcast; implies stripping of the net identification byte. bctp - broadcast input port on adjacent node; net identification byte is not stripped.

cdx6500GCTPVCBroadcastOutTable.name: cdx6500GCTPVCBroadcastOutTable
cdx6500GCTPVCBroadcastOutTable.description: A list of BCST PBCO configuration entries.

cdx6500bcstPBCOnum.name: cdx6500bcstPBCOnum
cdx6500bcstPBCOnum.description: Index for the BCST PBCO table.

cdx6500bcstPBCOnet.name: cdx6500bcstPBCOnet
cdx6500bcstPBCOnet.description: The configuration which follows will trigger broadcast traffic for this broadcast net.

cdx6500bcstPBCOconnection.name: cdx6500bcstPBCOconnection
cdx6500bcstPBCOconnection.description: Watch for connections destined to this channel. For example, a connection to port 1, channel 13 is P1(13), or a connection to port 2, station 4, channel 5 is P2S4(5).

cdx6500bcstPBCOdestination.name: cdx6500bcstPBCOdestination
cdx6500bcstPBCOdestination.description: Watch for connections destined to this channel. For example, a connection to port 1, channel 13 is P1(13), or a connection to port 2, station 4, channel 5 is P2S4(5).
